name: Vision HERO Minimum Ray
desc: If you take battle or effect damage: You can place this card from your GY face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. During the Main Phase, while this card is treated as a Continuous Trap: You can Tribute 1 "HERO" monster; Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned from the Spell & Trap Zone: You can destroy 1 Level 4 or lower monster your opponent controls. You can only use each effect of "Vision HERO Minimum Ray" once per turn.
